Segment.name: AOI
Segment.comment: To identify offspring/fetuses of the parent animal

Field.name: YesNoConditionOrResponseCode
Field.comment: Code indicating a Yes or No condition or response

Field.name: ReferenceIdentification1
Field.comment: Reference information as defined for a particular Transaction Set or as specified by the Reference Identification Qualifier

Field.name: GenderCode
Field.comment: Code indicating the sex of the individual

Field.name: TestPeriodOrIntervalValue1
Field.comment: Numeric value of period or interval signifying when a test event occurs

Field.name: UnitOfTimePeriodOrInterval1
Field.comment: Code indicating the time period or interval

Field.name: AnimalDispositionCode
Field.comment: Code identifying the disposition of an animal

Field.name: TestPeriodOrIntervalValue2
Field.comment: Numeric value of period or interval signifying when a test event occurs

Field.name: UnitOfTimePeriodOrInterval2
Field.comment: Code indicating the time period or interval

Field.name: ReferenceIdentification2
Field.comment: Reference information as defined for a particular Transaction Set or as specified by the Reference Identification Qualifier

Field.name: Date
Field.comment: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

Field.name: TestPeriodOrIntervalValue3
Field.comment: Numeric value of period or interval signifying when a test event occurs

Field.name: UnitOfTimePeriodOrInterval3
Field.comment: Code indicating the time period or interval
